name: Zucchini Mousse (Customizable)
description: Healthy, Creamy, Hidden Veggie Base - Add Whatever You Want!
ingredients: 2 cups raw zucchini, peeled and chopped
Your choice of flavor (see variations below)
2-3 tbsp maple syrup or honey (adjust to taste)
instructions: Peel and chop zucchini into chunks
Choose your flavor variation and add to blender with zucchini
Add maple syrup/honey, vanilla (if using), and salt
Blend on high until completely smooth and creamy (2-3 minutes)
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed
Pour mixture into small cups or bowls
Refrigerate overnight (or at least 4 hours) to thicken
Top with optional toppings and serve chilled!
• Chocolate: Add 3 tbsp cocoa powder + chocolate chips on top
• Strawberry: Add 1 cup strawberries + fresh strawberry slices on top
• Peanut Butter: Add 3-4 tbsp peanut butter + crushed peanuts on top
• Vanilla: Just use vanilla extract (simple and clean!)
• Banana: Add 1 ripe banana + banana slices on top
• Mix & Match: Get creative with whatever flavors you like!
